main event: A UFO sighting occurred in Ely, Nevada on 2-25-57 at 1837 hours.
interesting points: The UFO was described as a peculiar colored object the size of a basketball.
It passed the observer very fast, with the sighting lasting only 2 to 3 seconds.
The report does not contain any conclusions or further details.
The sighting was classified as a D. Air-Visual observation.
The Project Blue Book record card does not provide any explanation for the observed object.
sighted object: a peculiar colored object the size of a basketball
